entry.title: Feel Sooo Tired
entry.content:
I don’t know what’s wrong with me, I feel so tired in the afternoon, after doing literally nothing.

Morning, taking my little darling to Kindergarten, go home, cleaning the house a bit not the hard tasks, pick her up again, prepare lunch, eat our lunch, clean the dishes, and now hardly can do anything because of tired feeling.

I want to check, but will they believe me? It was a Brain Tumor suspicion and now Heart disease suspicion, they’ll think I am crazy, making it up.

But no, I don’t, I feel there is something wrong with me.

entry.title: Two Days No Headache - Endings
entry.content:
Since I got two worst headache two or three days ago, I didn’t even feel something on my head in the last two days, it was a bliss.

However, today, I felt slightly terrible headache for a few seconds infront of computer.

I did neck-gym 20 times, seems to be better, but I don’t want to have this kind of headache again, please not this one..

entry.title: It Comes After Meals
entry.content:
This two worst headaches that happened yesterday, I noticed it always came after meals. The first one came right after lunch, I was even still on my dinning chair.

The second one happened right after my dinner.

Sounds hard to believe but this headache is the one that happened in summer last year, when I called my mom in law to come over.

God, I hope it won’t come again…

It sounds crazy, but I told my husband to sue my first doc if it is a BT.

entry.title: Worst Headache of Mine
entry.content:
While I am having lunch today, I have worst headache ever, it was like 5-6 seconds on my forehead, but when it happened, It hurt so much that I would fall down on my chair.

I hope it would be the last time, because I’ve been well and happy in the last days.

entry.title: Another Day With Tomapirin
entry.content:
Today is a little bit cold, it can be the snow that we had yesterday, more and less 5 degrees.

Strange enough, because it’s colder today, I don’t have strange feeling on my chest or heart, but I do have terrible headache right after I picked my little darling from Kindergarten.

So bad that I took another Tomapirin and thanks God, it is now gone.

But I really wonder when does thing like this end in my life?

Anyway, here is the pic I took from a hill behind our garden, it was beautiful and make me smile seeing this scenery.
